DOC.brief_summary: This phase 3 study determine efficacy VEGF Trap-Eye inject eye vision function subject macular edema consequence central retinal vein occlusion .
DOC.brief_title: Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor ( VEGF ) Trap-Eye : Investigation Efficacy Safety Central Retinal Vein Occlusion ( CRVO )
